Je mi to líto psát, ale bohužel. Tahle hra by byla skvělá, akorát prostě vývojáři ničí tu hru. Největší problém ve hře, všichni si na to stěžují, je samozřejmě kempení a tunelování. Potom časté bugy. Né, vývojáři radši přidávají nový kontent. Ani mi nepříjde, kdyby si s tím dávali nějak extra záležet, např. mapy jsou sakra podobný a taky normálně jsem našel asi 10x místo, kde šlo něco přes texturu a taky přidají OP perky a nezamyslí se nad tím, jaký to bude mít dopad na balance hry.
Se for jogar de killer, o número de prevenção ao suicídio é 188.

Dead by Daylight is by all means a really great game, and I enjoy it a lot even if I don't have thousands upon thousands of hours on my back.
Playing either as a survivor or a killer is really fun, and getting to experience the different playstyles while learning the mechanics is absolutely satisfying.
However, I have 2 problems with this game: the DLC system and the grinding system.
On the DLC side, each individual DLC costs relatively cheap (from $4.38 to $8.19 USD where I live) but there's a lot of them, and even if you don't need it to """play""", once you start ranking up you need other killers/survivors perks because they are "meta", therefore holding you back from standing up against people who have all the DLC's.
Now, the grinding system is there in place to slowly work towards unlocking those perks or killers/survivors you need to stay at good ranks, but the problem I have with it is that it is too [b]s l o w[b], you get really almost nothing and you need to put at least 3 digit of hours to unlock ONE character. I get that unlocking DLC's for free is a great addition, but it really feels like the system is put in place to encourage buying because of how much time you need to sink into it to get anything out, and if  you're farming characters, forget about ever that set of cosmetics you want for your favourite character.
However, and despite all of it, I love DbD, and have bought all DLC. I admit I am part of the problem, but I really enjoy it to play on my free evenings for hours and hours. I just don't think it's very friendly for people who don't have a lot of money to spend or have hours upon hours of free time to farm the game. There's also the issue of balancing perks and killers, but that's always changing, so I cannot make a solid point on that.
It's still pretty fun, but I'd only recommend it if you either have a lot of time or a lot of money (as it is).

Review of the game as a surviver main:

Warning:  If you intend to play *solo* its just a skinner box with a low pay grind that you can't put down.  Also, the devs make horrific bugs and take way to long to fix even the simplest of them.  

Don't get unless you are willing to play with a voice chatting group all the time or you are a hard core top 10% Action/chill-under-stress gamer (in which case you'd be playing the game in an unrealistic way).

Although, the devs absolutely sabotaged the ability to join through discord directly.  So you will have to add them as a friend through steam just to play a few matches with them.  Oh the devs intentionally did this, officially it is so streamers stop getting joined by the random stream sabotagers (which they could stop other ways), but it is probably also to artifically increase the % of friends you have that play DBD.  These greedy devs make way more money than they deserve, seriously.  Also, they have stated they will never make non-humanoid killers, which is not exceptionally hard in modern coding.

Кратко перечислю плюсы и минусы.
  Плюсы(+) : интересные погони; классный сеттинг; увлекательная; разнообразие прокачки; прекрасное чувство, когда маньяк промахивается, как из-за своих ошибок, так и из-за того, что ты умеешь мансить.
  Минусы(-) : баги; лагающие сервера; проиграешь или еще что – обязательно напишут об этом в профиле(ну это вопрос к коммьюнити игры); игроки, которые не умея играть за маньяков, заходят в игру в качестве маньяка для того, чтобы выполнить ежедневку; хитбоксы(они то нормальные, то как коробки 2 метра в ширину и длину).
